LocalSoftware.Name: samtools
LocalSoftware.Description: SAM Tools provide various utilities for manipulating alignments in the SAM format, including sorting, merging, indexing and generating alignments in a per-position format.

LocalSoftware.Name: tagcleaner
LocalSoftware.Description: The TagCleaner tool can be used to automatically detect and efficiently remove tag sequences (e.g. WTA tags) from genomic and metagenomic datasets. It is easily configurable and provides a user-friendly interface.

LocalSoftware.Name: hmmer
LocalSoftware.Description: HMMER biosequence analysis using profile hidden Markov models

LocalSoftware.Name: subread
LocalSoftware.Description: The Subread package is developed in The Walter and Eliza Hall Institute of Medical Research, Melbourne, Australia. It consists of a suite of programs for processing next-gen sequencing data.

LocalSoftware.Name: trinity
LocalSoftware.Description: Package for RNA-Seq de novo Assembly

LocalSoftware.Name: mpiblast
LocalSoftware.Description: mpiBLAST is a freely available, open-source, parallel implementation of NCBI BLAST.

LocalSoftware.Name: bowtie
LocalSoftware.Description: Ultrafast, memory-efficient short read aligner

LocalSoftware.Name: bowtie
LocalSoftware.Description: Ultrafast, memory-efficient short read aligner

LocalSoftware.Name: tmhmm
LocalSoftware.Description: TMHMM 2.0 predicts transmembrane helices in proteins.

LocalSoftware.Name: blast
LocalSoftware.Description: NCBI BLAST+ sequence alignment package. The program compares nucleotide or protein sequences to sequence databases and calculates the statistical significance of matches.

LocalSoftware.Name: vcftools
LocalSoftware.Description: VCFtools is a program package designed for working with VCF files, such as those generated by the 1000 Genomes Project. The aim of VCFtools is to provide easily accessible methods for working with complex genetic variation data in the form of VCF files.

LocalSoftware.Name: cufflinks
LocalSoftware.Description: cufflinks - Transcript assembly, differential expression, and differential regulation for RNA-Seq

LocalSoftware.Name: intel-mkl
LocalSoftware.Description: Numerical library, contains blas/lapack

LocalSoftware.Name: intel-mkl
LocalSoftware.Description: Numerical library, contains blas/lapack

LocalSoftware.Name: prinseq-lite
LocalSoftware.Description: PRINSEQ can be used to filter, reformat, or trim your genomic and metagenomic sequence data.

LocalSoftware.Name: htseq
LocalSoftware.Description: HTSeq - Analysing high-throughput sequencing data with Python

LocalSoftware.Name: cd-hit
LocalSoftware.Description: cd-hit is a very widely used program for clustering and comparing protein or nucleotide sequences.

LocalSoftware.Name: fastx_toolkit
LocalSoftware.Description: FASTX Toolkit is a collection of command line tools for Short-Reads FASTA/FASTQ files preprocessing.

LocalSoftware.Name: lmod
LocalSoftware.Description: Lmod: An Environment Module System

LocalSoftware.Name: sff2fastq
LocalSoftware.Description: sff2fast extracts 454 Genome Sequencer reads from a SFF file and converts them into a FASTQ formatted output

LocalSoftware.Name: signalp
LocalSoftware.Description: signalp predicts the presence and location of signal peptide cleavage sites in amino acid sequences from different organisms: Gram-positive bacteria, Gram-negative bacteria, and eukaryotes.

LocalSoftware.Name: sickle
LocalSoftware.Description: A windowed adaptive trimming tool for FASTQ files using quality

LocalSoftware.Name: tophat
LocalSoftware.Description: TopHat2 is a fast splice junction mapper for RNA-Seq reads. It aligns RNA-Seq reads to mammalian-sized genomes using the ultra high-throughput short read aligner Bowtie, and then analyzes the mapping results to identify splice junctions between exons.

LocalSoftware.Name: NCL
LocalSoftware.Description: A library of graphics utilites from the Natl. Center for Atmospheric Research.

LocalSoftware.Name: bwa
LocalSoftware.Description: bwa - Burrows-Wheeler Alignment Tool

LocalSoftware.Name: rsem
LocalSoftware.Description: RSEM is a software package for estimating gene and isoform expression levels from RNA-Seq data.

LocalSoftware.Name: cap3
LocalSoftware.Description: CAP3: A DNA Sequence Assembly Program

LocalSoftware.Name: tassel
LocalSoftware.Description: While TASSEL has changed considerably since its initial public release in 2001, its primary function continues to be providing tools to investigate the relationship between phenotypes and genotypes1. As indicated by its title â€“ Trait Analysis by aSSociation, Evolution and Linkage â€“ TASSEL has multiple functions, including association study, evaluating evolutionary relationships, analysis of linkage disequilibrium, principal component analysis, cluster analysis, missing data imputation and data visualization.

LocalSoftware.Name: tassel
LocalSoftware.Description: While TASSEL has changed considerably since its initial public release in 2001, its primary function continues to be providing tools to investigate the relationship between phenotypes and genotypes1. As indicated by its title â€“ Trait Analysis by aSSociation, Evolution and Linkage â€“ TASSEL has multiple functions, including association study, evaluating evolutionary relationships, analysis of linkage disequilibrium, principal component analysis, cluster analysis, missing data imputation and data visualization.

LocalSoftware.Name: trinotate
LocalSoftware.Description: Trinotate is a comprehensive annotation suite designed for automatic functional annotation of transcriptomes, particularly de novo assembled transcriptomes, from model or non-model organisms.

LocalSoftware.Name: fastqc
LocalSoftware.Description: fastqc - A Quality Control application for FastQ files

LocalSoftware.Name: rnammer
LocalSoftware.Description: RNAmmer predicts 5s/8s, 16s/18s, and 23s/28s ribosomal RNA in full genome sequences.

LocalSoftware.Name: pyfasta
LocalSoftware.Description: Pyfasta - fast, memory-efficient, pythonic (and command-line) access to fasta sequence files.
